titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit judges presiding in family law proceedings to request directly taxpayer returns and return information.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/31/2004--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the Secretary of the Treasury and the Commissioner of Social Security to disclose tax returns and return information to a State or local court, upon the request by an order of such court, for purposes of family law proceedings.
